entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-06
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Add an attribute specifying the original type, when we create a diff of a ReloadableType #59954
    17.4

Updated

  • Source Generators Not Generating Sources #49249
  • Warnings CS1701 and CS1702 should be removed #19640
    Compiler.Next
  • Workspace failed with could not load "NuGet.Frameworks" error #61454

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63250
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Rename internal 'LanguageServices' namespace to not collide with new 'LanguageServices' type. #63249
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63248
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Emit MetadataUpdateOriginalTypeAttribute #63169
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #63247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Additional filter texts #63217
    Area-IDE, Next
  • create regular PRs for main-vs-deps insertion #63243
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Structural Error Cases for Lambda Default Parameters #62958
    Area-Compilers

Updated

  • Merge main to features/FixAllNamingViolation #63255
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/ConvertToRecord #63254
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/editorconfig_lsp #63253
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/DocumentOutline #63252
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to features/lambda-default-parameters #63251
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Support renaming multiple symbols in RenameLanguageService #62670
    Area-IDE
  • Remove one of our out of proc analyzers. #63183
    Area-IDE
  • Make SolutionServices (and related) APIs public #63241
    Area-IDE
  • Move options subsystem over to using SolutionService snapshots. #63245
    Area-IDE
  • Upgrade to .NET 7 P6 SDK #63062
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Allow Roslyn to access any evaluation properties #62445
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for incremental analysis for method body editing scenario… #63130
    Area-Analyzers
